Create user and Generate APIkey¶

Table of Contents

  • SIGN UP

  • EMAIL VERIFICATION

  • SIGN IN

  • CREATE AN PROJECT

  • GET AN API KEY

  • USE SDK WITH API KEY

The UI for user creation can be accesed at http://localhost:8082 ,by clicking on Sign Up button on top right, user will be able to view below pages

SIGN UP¶

Sign Up Page

After filling above details, click on Sign Up button. User will receive an Email for verification, on successful verification of email, user will be redirected to Sign In page.

EMAIL VERIFICATION¶

SIGN IN¶

Sign In Page

CREATE AN PROJECT¶

After successful login, user will be able to view project list page

Next user needs to create a project, by giving details as shown in below image

GET AN API KEY¶

After successful creation of project, you can go to Project Details Page to get API Key

USE SDK WITH API KEY¶

Using above generated API key you can use in python SDK client

import dltk_ai

client = dltk_ai.DltkAiClient('86122578-4b01-418d-80cc-049e283d1e2b', base_url='http://localhost:8000')

text = "The product is very easy to use and has got a really good life expectancy."

sentiment_analysis_response = client.sentiment_analysis(text)

print(sentiment_analysis_response.text)

Expected Output:

{
  "spacy": {"emotion": "POSITIVE", "scores": {"neg": 0.0, "neu": 0.653, "pos": 0.347, "compound": 0.7496}}
}

for more detailed information on Qubitai-DLTK python SDK features & usage please refer to this Documentation
